Organization.name: Office Français de Protection des Réfugiés et Apatrides (OFPRA)
Organization.description: French agency responsible for asylum applications and the protection of refugees and stateless persons.

Organization.name: Office Français de l'Immigration et de l'Intégration (OFII)
Organization.description: Handles immigration, integration, and asylum services in France.

Organization.name: Groupe d'information et de soutien des immigré·e·s (GISTI)
Organization.description: Provides legal support and information to immigrants and refugees in France.

Organization.name: La Cimade
Organization.description: Offers support and advocacy for refugees, migrants, and asylum seekers in France.

Organization.name: France Terre d'Asile
Organization.description: Advocates for and supports refugees and asylum seekers across France.

Organization.name: Emmaüs France
Organization.description: Provides housing and social support to marginalized groups, including refugees and migrants.

Organization.name: United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees (UNHCR)
Organization.description: UN agency dedicated to aiding and protecting refugees worldwide.

Organization.name: Croix-Rouge Française (French Red Cross)
Organization.description: Provides emergency assistance, disaster relief, and education in communities, including support for refugees.

Organization.name: Secours Catholique
Organization.description: Catholic organization providing social services, including support for refugees and migrants.

Organization.name: Amnesty International France
Organization.description: Part of the global human rights organization, advocating for the rights of refugees and migrants.

Organization.name: Médecins du Monde
Organization.description: International humanitarian organization providing medical care to vulnerable populations, including refugees.

Organization.name: International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC)
Organization.description: An impartial, neutral, and independent organization providing humanitarian protection and assistance.

Organization.name: Aide Sociale à l'Enfance (ASE)
Organization.description: Child protection services providing support for unaccompanied minors and at-risk children.

Organization.name: Caisse d'Allocations Familiales (CAF)
Organization.description: Provides family allowances and social services to families and vulnerable groups in France.

Organization.name: Caisse Nationale d'Assurance Maladie (CNAM)
Organization.description: Manages health insurance and social security services in France.

Organization.name: Centre National des Œuvres Universitaires et Scolaires (CNOUS)
Organization.description: Coordinates student services across France, including housing, scholarships, and social support.

Organization.name: Centre Régional des Œuvres Universitaires et Scolaires (CROUS)
Organization.description: Provides support services to students, including housing and financial aid.

Organization.name: Maison Départementale des Solidarités (MDS)
Organization.description: Offers social services and support to families, children, and elderly.

Organization.name: France Travail
Organization.description: Formerly known as Pôle Emploi, this organization supports job seekers and provides employment services.

Organization.name: Caisse Primaire d'Assurance Maladie (CPAM)
Organization.description: Provides health insurance and ensures access to healthcare services.

Organization.name: Ministère de l'Intérieur
Organization.description: Oversees public security, immigration, and civil protection in France.

Organization.name: Ministère des Solidarités et de la Santé
Organization.description: Responsible for public health, social services, and healthcare systems in France.

Organization.name: Ministère de la Justice
Organization.description: Handles the judicial system, including immigration courts in France.

Organization.name: Ministère des Solidarités et de la Cohésion Sociale
Organization.description: Manages social welfare programs and services for vulnerable populations.

Organization.name: Ministère de l'Éducation Nationale
Organization.description: Responsible for national education policy and services, including support for refugee students.

Organization.name: Réseau Éducation Sans Frontières (RESF)
Organization.description: Advocates for the rights of undocumented children to access education in France.

Organization.name: Solidarité Laïque
Organization.description: Supports access to education and social integration for vulnerable populations.

Organization.name: Réseau France Conflits (RFC)
Organization.description: Network providing support and advocacy for refugees and conflict-affected populations.

Organization.name: Association de Gestion du Fonds pour l'Insertion Professionnelle des Personnes Handicapées (AGEFIPH)
Organization.description: Supports the employment of people with disabilities in France.

Organization.name: Mission Locale
Organization.description: Provides employment support and social services to young people aged 16-25.
